[Link to dataset](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/tree/master/data/2024/2024-04-09) 

Things you plan to investigate using this dataset:

- Visual of totality of eclipse over a map
- What was the average totality duration for the 2024 total solar eclipse by state
- Create a summary of the eclipses seen in Missouri

Stat 251 topics you plan to cover during the analysis:

1. data visualization (ggplot)
2. working with dates and times (lubricate)
3. joining data (dplyr)
4. data cleaning (dplyr)
